CHAT.comment: April and her mother are sitting on a couch by a small coffee table , CJ research assistant , Loyal camera operator also present
living room of April's home , a rented apartment

u.a: <bef> April holds her mother's hand and points towards the corner of the room where a ball is under a chair .
mother looks where April is pointing
April picks up a Smurf which is on the table
April is holding a box of crayons
April fixes her gaze on the camera
child looks around for a soft toy called Garfield
April hands the box of colors to her mother
April is using a green crayon
April hands the crayon to her mother
April tips the colors out on to the table
April points to a soft toy called Appledumpling
April starts to color on the table top
April hands the paper to her mother
April points to Roy who is already known to her
April looks at her feet and touches her toes
April picks up a color and holds it up to her mother
April holds up the yellow , looks at her mother and names it
April looks at the colors as if examining them , chooses one and holds it up , it is red
April looks at her feet again
April rolls all the colors together
April hands the paper that she was coloring to her mother
mother looks at the corner of the paper
April looks at her feet again
April hands all the crayons to her mother
silence during which April looks at the picture she has drawn and then begins to sing to herself , April looks at the picture on the front of the coloring book .
April stands and pushes the stool very close to the table
April looks at the picture on the front of the book again
April looks towards a picture on the wall , it is a deer .
April looks at her soft toys and points
mother looks towards the picture but doesn't recognize the reference
April puts the crayons into the box
April hands the box to her mother
April picks up the box of crayons and gets the coloring book and hands them both to her mother
mother puts them back on the table top
April takes her mother by the hand
April leads her mother to the toy cupboard
April sees one of her toys on the floor
April hands the toy to Roy
begins to hand all her toys to Roy , Garfield falls off the chair arm
April picks up Garfield and hands it to Roy
April picks up more toys and gives them to Roy , Roy is now surrounded by the toys
April leads her mother by the hands to the kitchen which is adjacent to the living area
April puts her hand on her head
for some reason April's hair is still like a small babies , it hasn't grown
April is standing by the table again
April takes her mother by the hand again and leads her into the kitchen area
mother and April in the kitchen
they both come back from the kitchen
April looks at the camera and then at her mother
April points to the picture of Appledumpling on her cup and looks at it
mother comes back into the room
April points to Appledumpling on her cup
April tips the cup as she looks for Appledumpling
mother turns the cup until Appledumpling is facing April
April drops a raisin on the floor
April tries to get the raisin away from her mother
April looks into the pot which had the raisins in it
mother hands the raisin pot to April
they both go into the kitchen area .
April returns and gives a cookie to Roy
Roy realizes that he wasn't meant to eat the cookie
mother goes to the kitchen and gets another cookie , she brings it back and sits at the table
equal stress on the last two syllables
April drinks her apple juice and then hands the cup to her mother silence
an aeroplane goes over outside , the drapes are closed so April cannot see it
mother hands the juice to April
April looks at her foot , lifts it up and wiggles her toes
silence , April turns to her mother and fixes her gaze upon her mother .
mother changes her position on the couch , April turns to look at her mother but her mother has moved , April turns to her mother's new position , they both laugh .
silence , April turns to her mother and then looks at Roy
April holds her cup towards Roy
April looks at the photographs on the dresser , they are all of her
stress on second syllable of bebi
stress on first syllable of bebi
April blows a kiss to Loyal
April tips the raisins out on to the table
April hands the raisin cup to her mother
<aft> April pretends to count the raisins
as mother counts April puts the raisins in a straight line
April takes the cup from her mother's hand
April wanders back and to in front of her mother
April takes her mother by the hand and leads her into the kitchen
they both return from the kitchen area , April looks at the camera
during the following exchange April looks at the camera and never at her foot , her mother's responses are totally automatic
mother cuts another piece of apple
mother puts a napkin in front of April
April hands a piece of half chewed apple to her mother
April puts her cup on the napkin
she may be trying to say Loyal
April fiddles with her pant's leg
April attempts to take her mother into the kitchen again but mother doesn't move
cries , lies on the floor with one leg stuck up in the air .
April gets up and goes back to her mother
April puts her head behind her mother
April hands the raisin pot to her mother
April gets the slice of apple and gives it to her mother
mother puts the apple in the empty raisin pot . April takes a drink from the other cup
April puts the apple juice back on the table , then takes another drink
April cries and leads her mother by the hand into the kitchen
April looks at the cheese food .
silence , April points to the apple slices
is she trying to say apple seeds again ?
April can easily reach the apple
silence , April hands the apple slice to her mother and picks up her cup .
April points to the apple again
mother points to the apple seds on the dish
silence , April curls up and lowers her head
April looks at the camera and hides again
mother tickles her and April laughs
April drinks and opens her mouth very wide
April retrieves from Roy , takes it to her mother and hands it to her
mother points to the pumpkin that the Smurf is holding
silence during which April drinks , April takes the cup to Roy .
April turns to her mother and points to the cheese food
April starts to play with a ball
a video game in which the figure jumps
April waves her foot in the air
